question: 停める
sourceAnswer:
<read>とめる</read>:<tag><ja>止める</ja></tag>:: to{} stop/turn-off | park | prevent/suppress-(a-cough)/hold-back-(tears)/hold-(one's-breath)/relieve-(pain) | stop-(someone-from-doing-something)/dissuade/forbid/prohibit | notice/be-aware-of/concentrate-on/pay-attention-to/remember/bear-in-mind | fix-(in-place)/fasten/tack/pin/nail/button/staple | detain/keep-in-custody
<read>とどめる</read>:<tag><ja>留める</ja></tag>:: to{} stop/stay-(e.g.-the-night)/cease/put-an-end-to | contain/keep-(in-position,-in-place)/limit | record-(e.g.-a-fact)/retain
